intro: Corydalis solida var. trichophora, commonly known as the hairy corydalis, is a flowering plant native to regions of Asia, including China and Japan. Corydalis solida var. trichophora is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is also used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
